1.content:
What would be the best headline for this article?
$$choices
Cheaper Airfares for Pilotless Planes
Passengers Dissatisfied with Pilotless Planes
Billions of Pounds Saved Using Pilotless Planes
 UBS's Research on Safety of Remote Controlled Aircraft
Remote Controlled Aircraft Coming But Not Everyone Approves
$$

2.content:
What are paragraphs 3 and 4 mainly about?
$$choices
Passengers' safety
The aviation industry
 Aircraft manufacturers
Benefits of pilotless planes
The cost of employing pilots
$$

3.content:
How does Steve Landells feel about the pilotless flight?
$$choices
Worried
Bored
Satisfied
 Responsible
Indifferent
$$

4.content:
According to paragraph 6, what do the survey results indicate?
$$choices
 All air passengers are worried about safety.
The pilotless planes will continue to improve.
Different groups accept this technology equally.
Younger people are more accepting of this innovation.
Education background has nothing to do with technology acceptance
$$

5.content:
Which of the following is NOT mentioned as an advantage of remote controlled aircraft?
$$choices
 Improved safety
Price reduction for flyers
 Cost reduction for employing pilots
 Accommodation for more passengers
Profit opportunities for the aviation industry
$$
